title: ChatGPT isn’t putting me out of a job yet, but it’s very good fun

title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT shows why implementation is key with generative AI
description: OpenAI released ChatGPT this week, and it's a great example of why user experience is the future for generative AI.
content: It’s probably not a secret to those doing a lot of focused work in the space, but when it comes to generative AI, it’s quickly becoming apparent that how a user interfaces with generative models and systems is at least as important as the underlying ... [2743 chars]
